Talks and Poster presentations

By Thomas Gumbricht Google scholar Researchgate Scopus Linkedin Orcid

All presentations are available as pdf files (talks) or jgp images (posters). Click on the title to get to the page where you can read or download the source file.

Talks

  • Gumbricht, T., NASA, November 2017, Washington DC, USA 2017. Optical remote sensing of wetlands and lakes, hybrid approaches
  • Roman-Cuesta, R.-M. & Gumbricht, T., COP23, 6-17 November 2017, Bonn, Germany 2017. Monitoring peatland degradation: the case study of the Okavango River Delta, Botswana
  • Gumbricht, T. et al., GSOC17, March 2017, Rome, Italy 2017. An expert approach for identifying and mapping tropical wetlands and peatlands: areas, depths and volumes.
  • Gumbricht, T., CIFOR, September 2014, Bogor, Indonesia 2014. Hybrid mapping of tropical wetlands (movie)
  • Gumbricht, T., CIFOR, March 2014, Bogor, Indonesia 2014. Mapping extent, volume and carbon content of global tropical wetlands
  • Gumbricht, T., FAO, May 2013, Rome, Italy 2013. Mapping global tropical wetlands
  • Gumbricht, T., CIFOR, March 2014, Bogor, Indonesia 2012. Mapping carbon content of global tropical wetlands
  • Gumbricht, T., ICRAF, April 2011, Nairobi, Kenya 2011. ICRAF Geoinformatic unit
  • Gumbricht, T., ICRAF, September 2010, Nairobi, Kenya 2010. Vegetation and land cover changes in the cocoa belt in Ivory Coast.
  • Gumbricht, T., ICRAF, 29 June 2010, Nairobi, Kenya 2010. Lake Tanganyika Basin Land cover change and degradation hotspots.
  • Gumbricht, T., ICRAF, August 2009, Nairobi, Kenya 2009. West Africa Sahel: Changing Landscapes (movie)
  • Gumbricht, T., ICRAF, March 2008, Segou, Mali 2008. West Africa Sahel: Changing Landscapes
  • Gumbricht, T., Travellers Club, March 2008, Stockholm, Sweden 2008. Okavango
  • Gumbricht, T., OASIS, 2007, Montpeiller, France 2007. Understanding human-induced degradation of dryland agricultural and natural ecosystems.
  • Santino, G. & Gumbricht, T., FAO, June 2006, Entebbe, Uganda 2006. Glaciers in the Rwenzori Mountains: a reinterpretation
  • Shephard, K, Walsh, M & Gumbricht, T., ICRAF, 2005, Nairobi, Kenya 2005. Land degradation surveillance
  • Gumbricht, T., 11th World Lakes Conference, 2005, Nairobi, Kenya 2005. Lake level and area variations 1960 to 2002 in Lake Kyoga, Uganda.
  • Gumbricht, T., WERRD mid term meeting Windhoek, Namibia 2003. Remote sensing system perspective on the Okavango.
  • Gumbricht, T., FAO, 2003, Rome, Italy 2003. Lake Kyoga, Uganda.
  • Gumbricht, T., ASARECA, 2003, Entebbe, Uganda 2003. Agro-ecological zoning and water availability in East and Central Africa.
  • Gumbricht, T., ICRAF, Entebbe, 2005 2003. Lake Victoria, geoinformatics based maps and models for regional scale planning and management
  • Gumbricht, T., ETH, Sept 2002, Zurich, Switzerland 2002. The Okavango Delta - Microtopography and hydrology.
  • Gumbricht, T., & McCarthy, T., IAS, 2002, Johannesburg, South Africa 2002. Spatial patterns of islands and salt crusts in the Okavango Delta, Botswana
  • Gumbricht, T., ICRAF, May 2002, Nairobi, Kenya 2002. The Okavango Delta Botswana, Water dynamics and land cover patterns
  • Gumbricht, T., UNIGIS, 2000, Johannesburg, South Africa 2000. Portraying the geophysiology of the Okavango Delta, Botswana
  • Gumbricht, T., McCarthy, J, & McCarthy, T., 28th Intl Symp on Remote Sensing of Environment, 2000, Cape Town, South Africa 2000. Portraying the geophysiology of the Okavango Delta, Botswana

Posters

  • Gumbricht, T., Mapping Water Bodies from Space conference 18-19 March 2015, Rome, Italy 2015. Mapping Water Bodies and Wetlands from Multi-Spectral Optical Satellite Images.

  • Gumbricht, T., FAO, June 2006, Entebbe, Uganda 2006. Rwenzori Mountains - Glacier Retreat 1906 - 2005
